entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story who is unsure about his well-being.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who asks Harry what's wrong.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend who takes the initiative to ask Harry about his situation.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A person mentioned as having cornered Harry after a meeting.

relationships.description: Hermione asks Harry if Cho cornered him after the meeting.
Ron sniggers but stops when Hermione catches his eye.
